keyPolicies.policyTitle: Labour promises to stop NHS hospital closures at once.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Labour will save the NHS. The Tories only care about cost cutting, while we’ll invest £37bn to properly fund the NHS.
Labour will take 5% from the wealthiest top 5% of earners to fund public schools and provide free school meals for all.
Labour will properly fund public services and put extra police on the street. Barrie supports Jeremy Corbyn’s vision of less nuclear deterrent spending on the Trident weapons program.

issues.defence: Barrie supports Jeremy Corbyn’s vision of less nuclear deterrent spending on the Trident weapons program. Labour will properly fund public services and put extra police on the street.
issues.education: Labour will take 5% from the wealthiest top 5% of earners to fund public schools and provide free school meals for all.

contactInformation.address: Labour Central Owen Street Lincoln LN6 7TS

quotes.text: This General Election is a stark choice for the country. Vote Labour for the many not the few, to stop the Conservatives’ attack on public services and protect the NHS from closer.

images.caption: Vote Labour for the many not the few.

examples: The Tories only care about cost cutting, while we’ll invest £37bn to properly fund the NHS.
